children.name: Governer
children.information: Honorable Governor of Tamil Nadu Thiru Banwarilal Purohit, who is the Constitutional Head of the state.

children.name: Chief Minister
children.information: Honorable Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu Thiru Edappadi K. Palaniswami, who is the Head of the elected Government and heads the Council of Ministers.

children.name: Chief Justice
children.information: Honorable Justice Thirumathi Vijaya Kamlesh Tahilramani, who is the Chief Justice of Madras High Court

children.name: Chief Secretary
children.information: Dr Thirumathi Girija Vaidyanathan, who is the chief Secretary to the Goverment
